description: Check a list of domain names for availability.
availability: All users have access to this command.

paramaters.Definition: If the domain is a IDN domain, you have to submit the IDN language tag with this parameter (e.g. DE for German IDN domains)
Switch the mode of doing availability checks. AUTH will check against the registry.  DNS and RAWDNS will use the DNS to check but can have false positives. The default is AUTH.
When stating claims in this parameter the command will return if there are claims for this domain.
To check the availability and query further information of premium domains this parameter has to be set to * or the respective premium channel
